comments.content: The Chinese have been secretly cloning humans for years. That's why there's so many of them
The first humans to be cloned were Russian twins called Irana and Targa
Public officials use human clones to help them with tasks they don't want to do themselves
Centres for human cloning around the world secretly work to replace the entire current human race
The US government has an ultra-secret human cloning program
Human cloning is legal in Qatar
Twints don't actully exist - they are just the outcomes of medical cloning experiments
Ever since JFK, all US presdients got clones who replace them during public appearances. The real ones are kept safe in the White House
